value: Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.

Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Extra Stage 2 in Tap Battle. (Extra Stage
2 is playable after it unlocks.)

Clear Extra Stage 3 in Tap Battle. (Extra Stage
3 is playable after it unlocks.)

Clear Paralogue 68: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 68: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 68: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Hoshido-raised Azura and Leanne of the Heron
Clan descend upon the Hatari festival, ready to
take on their roles as songstresses. They appear
in Fire Emblem Fates / Path of Radiance.

A swordswoman known as the Sword Vassal.
Looking to test her limits at Hatari's festival,
where many a proud fighter has gathered.
Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Queen of Hatari, a desert kingdom. Holding one
of Hatari's traditional festivals in Askr for a bit
of fun. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

A skilled mercenary who once came to Celica's
aid. Having been invited to the Hatari festival,
he decided he would see it for himself. Appears
in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A mysterious young man who can adopt the
appearance of others. He's come to answer the
call of Hatari festivities with aplomb. Appears
in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the
Harmonized button. This skill can be used only
once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be
used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Resonance Effect: Fates /
Path of Radiance
Increases scores in Resonant Battles.
(More details can be found in the Help
messages within Resonant Battles.)

Can grant an action to allies from the
same titles twice. Can also grant extra
movement and Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6.

Starts with a Special trigger ready
and an extra movement, plus her
Special triggers often at close range.

Restricts her foe's movement after
attacking, heals on Special trigger,
and is even fiercer transformed.

Inflicts Deep Wounds on his target
after attacking and can also prevent
counterattacks.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At the start of turn 1, grants Special cooldown
count-2 to unit. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during
combat and deals damage = X% of unit's Spd
when Special triggers (X = unit's max Special
cooldown count value × 10, + 20).

$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat, and also, if
unit attacked, deals 7 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.
Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aAt start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+5 to unit during combat, and also, if
unit attacked, deals 7 damage to target and
foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.
Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Grants Atk+3. If Sing or Dance is used, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.
At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

$aFoe cannot recover HP during or after combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage
to and inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

$aFoe cannot recover HP during or after combat.
After combat, if unit attacked, deals 7 damage
to and inflicts【Deep Wounds】on target and foes
within 2 spaces of target.

【Deep Wounds】
Unit's HP cannot be healed through its
next action.

$aEnables【Canto (Rem. +1)】while transformed.
Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces
of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit
and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's
follow-up attacks or prevent unit's follow-up
attacks during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If
unit transforms, grants Atk+2, deals +7 damage
when Special triggers, and neutralizes effects
that grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe
or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn +1.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger after the granted action. Unit's base
movement has no effect on movement granted.
Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy)
a distance greater than unit's remaining
movement +1.)

If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+7, Def+10
to unit during combat, and also, if unit deals
damage to foe using a Special, restores HP
= X% of unit's max HP (X = unit's max Special
cooldown count value × 20, + 10; max 100).
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

Grants Res+5 to allies in cardinal directions
of unit during combat.
